original_title: Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship 15: Shewmaker vs. O'Bannon
overview: Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship 15: Shewmaker vs. O'Bannon' was a bare-knuckle boxing event held by Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship on December 11, 2020 at the Mississippi Coast Coliseum in Biloxi, Mississippi, USA.
title: Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship 15: Shewmaker vs. O'Bannon
